cardDescription: Trees Residences offers the indulgence of a hushed, quiet neighborhood in the heart of Novaliches, Quezon City
bannerAbout: Trees Residences offers the indulgence of a hushed, quiet neighborhood in the heart of Novaliches, Quezon City. With its very own retail area within the complex, you never have to leave home for the basics, giving you more time with the family to enjoy its exclusive amenities
bannerFeatures: Automatic Fire Detection and Alarm System
Standby Generator Set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets
Garbage Disposal Area for Every Floor

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Go inside Tree Residences and you'll see why it's the perfect new home for you. With a luxurious lobby that mirrors boutique hotels, along with generous spaces, quality furniture, and friendly staff members that's dedicated to make you feel at home.

feature.title: Peace in the heart of the city
feature.description: Trees Residences offers the relaxing atmosphere of a quiet, peaceful neighborhood in the heart of Novaliches, Quezon City. Inside, you can enjoy lush natural gardens, lovely strolling paths, and 5-star amenities. While you can venture outside to get what you need from Quezon City, a built-in retail area ensures you never need to leave home for just the basics.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Spreading with amenities like standby genertors, swimming pools, basketball courts, 24/7 security, and its very own retail area within the complex, you have more time and more ways to enjoy the life at SMDC Tree Residences with your family.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: The best part about Trees Residences is the living space, a perfect place to grow and nurture your family, and the best place to be for those who are starting to live the independent life.

Your perfect blend of convenience and comfort begins here!

cardDescription: Welcome a new way of life with Vail Residences located in Mindanao's finest neighborhood: Uptown, Cagayan de Oro City!

Resort-inspired amenities, hotel-like lobbies with Wi-Fi access, open parks, play spaces, and integrated commercial spaces occupy the grounds while top-notch shopping, entertainment, and leisure establishments and educational institutions can be all found nearby for your convenience.

name: Vine Residences
cardAddress: Brgy. San Bartolome, Novaliches, Quezon City
cardDescription: Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm expansive pools. These are just a few of the amenities enclosed within the gated community of SMDC's Vine Residences. Located within the SM City Novaliches complex
bannerAbout: MORE THAN JUST A HOME Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm expansive pools. These are just a few of the amenities enclosed within the gated community of SMDC's Vine Residences. Located within the SM City Novaliches complex, it offers lifestyle unlike any other in the area. Here, homes lie amongst rolling grassy spaces for a quiet and relaxed ambiance. While entertainment, convenience, and a transportation hub are found in the mall next door. At Vine Residences, you get more than just a home, you get a lifestyle.
bannerFeatures: Stand by Generator set for Common Areas & Select Unit Outlets

grandLobby.title: Grand Lobby
grandLobby.description: Arrive in a development which offers more than just a home!

feature.title: More than just a home
feature.description: Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm, expansive pools. These are but a few of the exclusive amenities you can enjoy within the gated community that is Vine Residences. Beyond it, you can explore the next-door SM City Novaliches or travel farther via the major roads and transport hubs nearby.

amenity.title: Amenities
amenity.description: Strewn around its amenity area are spaces of fun and leisure like parks, pools, fitness zones, play areas, and lounges. Stroll leisurely along the manicured pathways of the Central Park and admire the Sunken Garden. Jumpstart your day with a swim at any of the two adult pools or take your children to their first dip at the children's splash pool.

unit.title: Units
unit.description: Carefully designed to be the source of ultimate comfort. The intelligent use of space creates a comfortable living experience to its residents.

name: Wind Residences
cardDescription: Indulge in soothing cool breezes at Wind Residences. Found along Aguinaldo Highway, this Tagaytay condominium stands in its own complex providing convenient access to everything you need which includes shops, restaurants, and more.
bannerAbout: When you live at Wind Residences, the holiday never has to stop. Just an hour south of Manila in Tagaytay City, you can treat yourself to country club amenities including the clubhouse, indoor and outdoor swimming pools, tennis court, and basketball court. Its location also lets you get to the nearby restaurants and cafes filled with delicious dishes only found here.
